pkgmetadata.longdescription: A Lending Club API Wrapper // Functions to access Lending Club's API and assist the investor manage their account. Lending Club is a peer-to-peer lending service where loans are broken up into $25 notes that investors buy with the expectation of earning a return on the interest. You can learn more about the API here: http://www.lendingclub.com/developers/lc-api.action.
